_header: Seven days are that men call / The Sunday is the best of all
Subjects: Paul, saint; legends, of the afterlife
_description: The Vision of St. Paul — 252 lines in 6-line stanzas

BodLauMis108.First Lines:
SEue dawes aren þat men calleȝÞe sonenday is best of
                    alle…
BodLauMis108.Last Lines:
…Þat we moten þine face i seoLouerd þoruȝh
                    þine holie grace
